attributes.action: Welcome President Trump to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
President Trump is only trying to protect the American people
from terrorism and what he does in his country is really none
of our business.America is a good friend of the UK and if we
carry on the way we are we will lose that friendship,if we do
we will be the loser.
attributes.background:
I think it is totally wrong to petition against President Trumps
visit when he welcomed our prime minister with open arms.
